choices: Your super overweight bed bound cousin
1.content: You are woken up by your alarm clock buzzing over and over again. After a couple of tries you finally turn it off and get ready for the day. After getting your clothes on you go downstairs to get some breakfast. Your mother then comes into the kitchen and tells you about how the family is tight on money and all the family is going to be participating in a new experimental surgery to get alight of money. Later you and all the rest of your family head to the hospital. The doctor explains to you and your family about how the surgery will go. He tells you that you will be conjoined from the neck down with one of your many family members. He also tells you that you get to choose who you will be conjoined from the neck down with. So who do you pick to be conjoined from the neck down with for the rest of your life?
1.title: Hope you like conjoinment

info.description: You are to take part in a new exparemental test where your conjoined from the neck down with one of your family members
